data.message: As of this morning, when I try to go to my links of groups and to see Most Recent posts, etc (from my mobile device), that screen isn't updating like it should. Any help to fix that?

replies.message: Hi Patty. If you're experiencing a problem with the app, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2x1w277 . -Tenaya
Same here. I don't think it's a screen refresh issue, but a design update. If it's a design update, it's a terrible one.

Mine is doing the same thing. I tried to report it using the link above but after I submitted it it said it couldn't be processed and to try later. All of my favorited groups are gone as well as the " most recent " option for my newsfeed.
I would post a screenshot but now there's no option for me to post a picture in comments

Facebook hi there in CA
how do you recognize an fake account on Facebook?

I just reported it. I was worried it was a design update, then everything reappeared briefly. This morning the options were available and literally disappeared in front of my eyes; hopefully meaning it's just a glitch, that they will fix soon.
I came here to see if others were having this problem too

....until that time. They must be hold responsible for a lot of wrongdoing true this app.
I try to report something but wasn't go trough that report.
I try to call Facebook in California at their headquarter but customer service aren't exist even if they tell you to press 1 for them.
So next step I bring them in court for some explanation and to find out who are that fake accounts who contacted me.
Facebook must to have records of phone numbers , ip addresses , geo-locations etc....
See you!
Facebook this link won't let me submit. It says try again later.
Won't submit. ALL groups, saved items, most recent, etc are gone. Really?
Same thing happening for me too... Seems to be a bug with the new update. I hope they fix it soon
Messenger chat heads stopped working, Samsung S4
Mine is all back to normal, thank goodness!!

Same thing happened to my dad yesterday. He claimed to have called an 800 number to facebook and they said he was hacked and they wanted $300 from him paid by credit card and they would fix it. Now he is locked out of his account??????
